column3:
む！ リンク！
わしはハイリア人を誤解していたようゾラ…
ヒレもエラもないくせに あの神獣を止めるとは
さすが ミファー様の想い人 あっぱれゾラ
column4:
Oh! Link! It would seem I misunderstood
Hylians before...

You don't have any fins or gills, yet you
still managed to stop the Divine Beast...

I should have expected as much from
Lady Mipha's beloved. Well done.

column3:
水の神獣のやつめ…
どうしてくれようか…
column4:
Divine Beast Vah Ruta...
Behold the havoc it wreaked...

column3:
今後とも この不肖ムズリを
よろしく頼むゾラ！
column4:
I hope you can find it in your heart to
forgive an incompetent fool such as me!
